title: Studio apartment home with large patio@ Eaves Foster City
map_address: 700 Marlin Ave near Foster City Blvd
posting_body: Welcome to eaves Foster City – where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living.
Here, we offer quality Foster City apartments with a few little extras, like newly renovated interiors with modern finishes and private patios or balconies.
Simply put, our apartments in Foster City offer more of what you hope for.
So, what are you waiting for?
Foster City is a fabulous place to live in North San Mateo County and you deserve an equally fabulous apartment while living there.
At eaves Foster City, that's exactly what you'll get.
These Foster City apartments are conveniently located near the 101, 280 and 92 freeways, as well as the Caltrain line.
You will never experience a dull moment with Sunfish Park, Antones Cocktail Lounge and the Foster City Recreation Center all just a few minutes away.
Discover a stress-free lifestyle where every comfort you’ve ever dreamt of is within your reach.
We offer our residents a superb range of amenities including an outdoor solar heated pool and sundeck, fitness center, on-site laundry facility and resident clubhouse.
We’ll immediately handle any problems that arise, allowing you to pay attention to the more important things in your life.
Contact us to schedule an appointment and learn more about your new apartment in Foster City today.
